timeline.message: DHFPROD-6261: Page Size functionality for the Load List pagination is broken

timeline.bodyText:
Pagination looks good but I see you undid some of my recent work that was needed for preserving pagination when cancelling 'Add to New Flow'. Was it a necessary change for this ticket?
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VIKQ0OfuiTSqONtrZfP_Ra28Kpyxc3ZN/view
timeline.author: briantang

replies.bodyText: @briantang No it wasn't necessary change. Can you please review again.
replies.author: timur-isangulov
